name: K2
description:
We are the biggest agency in Poland with three, combined, specializations:
We create digital products. We design innovative services and user interfaces like an UX agency. Our IT team is composed of 50+ people and develops complex  platforms, apps and websites like a software house.
We build brands. We create ideas that work in every medium. We blur the lines between offline and online. We can create communication format for TV as well as content to fit the social media perfectly.
We transform business. We act as a consulting company, but we do not flood our clients with thousands of slides.
READ MORE...

locations.address: K2 Internet SA Ul. Domaniewska 44a, building Platinium 5
